title: Creating static blog with Sapper, TailwindCSS and Github pages - Part 3
excerpt: This is the third part of the tutorial series about creating static blog with Sapper, TailwindCSS and Github pages. In this part we are going to add categories and pagination to our blog.

title: Creating static blog with Sapper, TailwindCSS and Github pages - Part 2
excerpt: This is the second part of the tutorial series about creating static blog with Sapper, TailwindCSS and Github pages. In this part we are going to style our blog.

title: Creating static blog with Sapper, TailwindCSS and Github pages
excerpt: Static websites became very popular lasy years. Tools like GatsbyJS and Jekyll exist for some time. However, I decided to try something different and kinda underground - recently released Svelte 3 with Sapper.
